name: peerjs-av-chat
description: A library to setup a single peerjs-based audio-video-chat connection between two peers.

scripts.build:domain: npm run build && npm run typedoc
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch --force -m "Patch release" && npm run publish
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor --force -m "Minor release" && npm run publish
scripts.major-release: npm version major --force -m "Major release" && npm run publish
scripts.publish: git commit package.json -m "version bump" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
